title: Baseball Hall Of Fame Legend Ernie Banks Dies At 83
teaser: The Chicago Cubs slugger was affectionately called "Mr. Cub" and "Mr. Sunshine." He spoke about his life in baseball with Steve Inskeep. (This piece initially aired Oct. 13, 2009 on Morning Edition).
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
